title: Checked status all servers up, what's wrong?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Restarted Client, still gives me the error.

replies.body: This is a pretty weird error that we're just starting to see recently. I've heard from a lot of our players that simply spam clicking the redeem button will eventually make it work, not the best solution I know but it seems to be working! If that doesn't get you anywhere, I'd go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can get a good look at what's going on there.
Yeah i did that and eventually worked, thanks for the reply anyway, and hope you guys fix it.
